name: Professional Boulder Dash
overview: Professional Boulder Dash is a 1985 Rom Hack of Boulder Dash III with edited levels and faster gameplay. It was modified by Sijben Soft. Published in Italy as Roc in Super Game 2000 n.10 (Dicembre 1985) and in Supplementi Edigamma/pubblirome - super top (1986). Rocford aka Roc, the lovable hero of the game, must recover all the diamonds found in the Silicen mine. The collection of gems is very dangerous ass the mine, which has been abandoned for centuries, is subject to landslides produced by every slightest movement. The quarries of the mine are populated by strange forms of life: the prolific green amoebas and the frenetic butterflies. These beings with particular precautions can be transformed into precious diamonds. Amoebas must be surrounded by boulders to prevent their continuous development while butterflies crushed by boulders will expose a diamond for the taking. Beware of terrible and deadly electric quadropolises that, released from their cells, will chase and disintegrate you. The riches of this mine are at your disposal but it will not be easy to take possession of them.
